snippet: Raymond Felton, who was out of shape for the preseason in Portland last season, showed up a week early to Knicks training camp, proud to be back on the team where he spent the best days of his career.
abstract: New York Knicks point guard Raymond Felton, who has admitted that he was out of shape last season with the Portland Trail Blazers, shows up to training camp a week early, proud to be back on the team where he spent the best days of his career.
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton, who was out of shape for the preseason in Portland last season, showed up a week early to Knicks training camp, proud to be back on the team where he spent the best days of his career.

headline.seo: Felton Is Happy to Be Back With the Knicks
headline.main: Felton Is Happy to Be Back With the Knicks
headline.print_headline: Felton Is Happy to Be Back With the Knicks
